test_cases.name: test_get_top_account
test_cases.description: gets the top account by revenue
test_cases.intent: get my top account by revenue

expected_output.response: **Top Account by Revenue** - **Name:** Andromeda Inc. - **Revenue:** $9,700,000 - **Account ID:** acc_49

test_cases.name: test_get_contacts
test_cases.description: get all contacts names from a single company
test_cases.intent: get all my contacts (name only) from apex that start with the letter A

expected_output.response:
**Contacts from Apex starting with 'A':**

- Alice Johnson
- Alice Miller
- Alice Williams
- Alice Davis
- Alice Wilson
- Alice Martinez
- Alice Rodriguez
- Alice Garcia

*Note: The list contains duplicates; all names currently start with 'Alice' as per available data.*

test_cases.name: test_get_job_title
test_cases.description: get the job titles of the third party account with the highest revenue
test_cases.intent: get me the job titles of the third party account with the highest revenue

expected_output.response:
**Job titles for the third-party account with the highest revenue:**

- Vice President of Sales
- Product Manager
